int  nullDim,
double *  nullSpace,
double *  minNormSln,
double *  lowerBounds,
double *  upperBounds 
)

This sets up the contact limits lmi. It requires the Grasp map null space, the minimum norm solution and the lower and upper bounds of each null space dimension.

Adapted from Li Han's Code.
